channel.title: Any1 Got Some Good Ideas for my pure?
channel.description:
Well, I will be based on range, but well have r2h knock out.
Current Stats are:
Attk 31 Str 31 Mage 1 (keeping it that way, waste of money, ( i could care less about 2 hp), and I'm lvl 1 edgevill Range 50 Hp 41
(EDIT: 40 attk wewt, 35 str)
What do you think I should get my stats to: What do you think I should get my str/attk to in order for me to get a good r2h k.o?
Thanks.

item.title: Any1 Got Some Good Ideas for my pure?
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Attk 40
Str 75+
Mage 1
Range 50 - Shudda got 40 for Green D Hide and then no more.
Hp 70+

If your a F2P Pker, those are good stats. I would reccomend Fire Blast, but hey, mage isn’t that important in F2P

Read full topic
item.source: Any1 Got Some Good Ideas for my pure?

item.title: Any1 Got Some Good Ideas for my pure?
item.dc:creator: @not2good not2good
item.description:
@not2good wrote:

yup, true. I’m making a pure (laughs at though) and it has 57 mage 60 range. I’m gonna get some str later, it’s f2p.

Mage isn’t a waste of money, if you get a few good hits and use fire blast, bai bai.
